/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with vibrant signs and advertisements, adding a splash of color to the otherwise overcast sky. A large concrete overpass arches over the street, its imposing structure a testament to the city's architectural prowess. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Despite the overcast sky, the image is rich in detail and offers a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing.
